content:
CarePlan.activity.reference does not support SupplyRequest, but the equivalent in CDA does:
https://www.hl7.org/ccdasearch/templates/2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.43.html

Is this a mistake/omission?
I don't recall any discussions to exclude it, so I would recommend logging a change request for Patient Care to evaluate adding support for it
Oh, wait, SupplyRequest is not patient specific, so it can't be the resource that corresponds to the CDA
